document_data.name: Acham el Jhotos
document_data.mainbody: '''Acham el Jhotos''', whose full name was '''Acham yn Aban el Jhotos, yi Almraiven''' and who was commonly referred to as the '''Weavepasha''', was a mighty wizard and the ruler of [[Almraiven]] in [[Calimshan]]. He was considered to be one of the most powerful mortals alive in [[1479 DR|1479]]. His entire life was dedicated to defending the city of Almraiven from [[djinn]], [[efreet]], and other menaces. He appeared as an older man but in reality was much older. His oldest granddaughter, the [[Alzhedo dictionary#V|vizar]] [[Munaa el Jhotos|Munaa yr Oma el Jhotos]], was nearly 100 years old. Acham was an abolitionist who wanted to free all the slaves in Calimshan.
document_data.Appearance: Acham el Jhotos appeared as an older, grey-haired man with olive skin and a short-trimmed grey beard that ended in a sharp point.
